entry.title: 测试
entry.content:
前言

Hexo 是一个快速、简洁且高效的博客框架。Hexo 使用 Markdown（或其他渲染引擎）解析文章，在几秒内，即可利用靓丽的主题生成静态网页。

准备安装Hexo的环境

在安装Hexo前，先安装

  • Node.js
    下载地址：

    https://nodejs.org/en/
  • Git
    下载地址：

    https://git-scm.com/
  • VScode
    下载地址：

    https://code.visualstudio.com/Download

    加速下载方式：

    先在vscode官网找到你要的版本，下载，然后将红框地址替换为：vscode.cdn.azure.cn

    安装步骤参考

    链接：

    https://blog.csdn.net/Colincoin/article/details/102594799

    NodeJs 的安装及配置环境变量

    https://blog.csdn.net/zimeng303/article/details/112167688

    github仓库以及ssh关联

    配置参考链接：

    https://blog.csdn.net/thesat/article/details/122657537?spm=1001.2101.3001.6661.1&utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant_t0.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7ERate-1-122657537-blog-102594799.pc_relevant_3mothn_strategy_and_data_recovery&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant_t0.none-task-blog-2%7Edefault%7ECTRLIST%7ERate-1-122657537-blog-102594799.pc_relevant_3mothn_strategy_and_data_recovery&utm_relevant_index=1

    安装过程中遇到的问题

    环境配置问题：

    Node.js的node 类库默认安装位置不修改也可以以及环境配置不配置也可以

    Git Bash 可以正常使用，但cmd不能使用git命令

    参考链接：

    https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_45272449/article/details/115293854

    npm安装报错

    参考链接：

    https://blog.csdn.net/qq_42780155/article/details/119025638

    Github+HEXO FATAL bad indentation of a mapping entry at line 84

    参考链接:

    https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_30756499/article/details/99167910

    hexo d命令报错 ERROR Deployer not found: git

    参考链接:

    https://blog.csdn.net/qq_21808961/article/details/84476504

    hexo INFO Validating config错误解决方案以及hexo部署到github主页404打不开解决方案

    参考链接:

    https://blog.csdn.net/wilde123/article/details/111406371

    Maybe you can find the solution here: http://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html

    参考链接：

    https://blog.csdn.net/AinUser/article/details/79548218

    命令参考链接

    Markdown 官方教程

    https://markdown.com.cn/basic-syntax/line-breaks.html

    hexo 官方文档

    https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html

    博客搭建

  • 1 https://blog.csdn.net/qq_51513895/article/details/119915427?spm=1001.2014.3001.5502
  • 2 https://blog.csdn.net/qq_51513895/article/details/120023234
  • 3 https://blog.csdn.net/qq_51513895/article/details/120065812?spm=1001.2014.3001.5502
  • 4 https://blog.csdn.net/qq_51513895/article/details/120195442?spm=1001.2014.3001.5502

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment
